articles.title: Man City fan reveals what Jurgen Klopp does better than anyone else at Liverpool - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: James Erskine, director of the new Liverpool documentary 'The End Of The Storm', is a Man City fan and has opened up on what makes the Reds so special
articles.content:
On July 22, 2020, the players, staff and supporters of Liverpool Football Club were able to experience a moment 30 years in the making.
